translations: v．品尝，享受：尽情地品味或欣赏某物。
· She savors every moment of her vacation.
她尽情地享受着度假的每一个时刻。
n．风味，滋味：食物或饮料的特殊味道。

sentences.sentence: Has visual artistic, the content savors the high unique charm.
sentences.translation: 具有视觉艺术性强，内容品味高的独特魅力。

sentences.sentence: I am lucky to have a very dear friend who savors my eccentricities.
sentences.translation: 可我很幸运的有一个非常亲密的朋友，她能欣赏我的这些怪癖。

sentences.sentence: He savors the last of his free glass of Chilean cabernet sauvignon as his son looks on with pride.
sentences.translation: 在孩子崇拜的目光中，他喝完了最后一杯智利赤霞珠。
